meanings.sent1: I love snacking on cavendishes during my break.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a fresh batch of cavendishes today.
meanings.sent3: Why did the monkey bring a cavendish to the party? To make everyone go bananas!
meanings.sent4: The cavendishes in the fruit bowl were as yellow as sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of the cavendish made it a delightful treat.

meanings.sent1: She baked a delicious pie using cavendishes from the orchard.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's market had a special on cavendishes this week.
meanings.sent3: The cavendish apple rolled off the table and caused a fruity mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and crisp as a cavendish apple.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the cavendish filled the kitchen with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: He enjoyed the rich aroma of cavendishes in his pipe.
meanings.sent2: The tobacco shop had a new shipment of cavendishes for sale.
meanings.sent3: The cavendish tobacco was so strong, it made him cough.
meanings.sent4: The smoke from the cavendish curled in the air like a lazy cat.
meanings.sent5: The cavendish tobacco had a deep, earthy flavor.
